Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Exempts coin-operated tire inflation equipment from sales and use taxes
Summary: Exempts the service of inflating tires and other inflatable personal property from sales and use taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting coin-operated tire inflation equipment from sales and use taxes
